item.title: 凯雷集团称财富管理业务自2023年以来实现翻番增长
item.description: 自2023年哈维·施瓦茨出任首席执行官以来，凯雷集团的财富管理业务规模已接近翻番，目前该业务占集团资金流量的比重预计将达到20%。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s wealth business has nearly doubled since Harvey Schwartz became chief executive officer in 2023 and is on track to account for some 20% of the firm’s capital flows.】

item.title: 美国议员称英伟达在华审批将受内存短缺影响
item.description: 据众议院中国事务委员会首席共和党议员援引本周商务部颁布的法规条款称，内存芯片供应紧张将限制美国向英伟达公司发放向中国客户销售H200人工智能处理器的出口许可证数量。【原文：Tight memory chip supplies will constrain the number of US export licenses for Nvidia Corp. to sell its H200 artificial intelligence processors to Chinese customers, according to the top Republican on the House China committee, citing terms of a Commerce Department rule issued this week.】

item.title: 秘鲁经济意外大幅放缓，铜业领跌
item.description: 秘鲁11月经济增速远低于预期，主要原因是铜产量大幅下滑。【原文：Peru’s economy expanded much less than forecast in November due to a slump in copper output.】

item.title: 高盛探索预测市场机遇，所罗门表示
item.description: 高盛集团正寻求在预测市场中开拓机遇，使这家投行能够从快速发展的现实事件投注平台中获益。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is looking at opportunities in prediction markets, positioning the investment bank to benefit from the fast-growing forums for bets on real-world events.】

item.title: 埃奎诺尔获裁决重启特朗普叫停的风电项目
item.description: 美国一名法官裁定埃尼集团可重启其在纽约附近耗资数十亿美元的风电项目建设，这标志着本周联邦法院第二次阻止特朗普政府强制叫停海上开发项目。【原文：A US judge ruled Equinor ASA can resume building its multibillion-dollar wind project near New York, marking the second time this week a federal court has blocked the Trump administration from enforcing a halt on offshore developments.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油天然气收入跌至五年低点，预算受重创
item.description: 俄罗斯石油和天然气行业的收入——这是其在乌克兰战争中至关重要的资金来源——在2025年跌至五年低点，原因是原油价格暴跌且天然气出口量下降。【原文：Russia’s revenues from its oil and gas industry, vital to financing its war in Ukraine, dropped to a five-year low in 2025 as crude prices slumped and gas exports declined.】

item.title: 加拿大汽车工厂销量因芯片短缺和美加贸易战跌至三年低点
item.description: 受全球芯片短缺、需求疲软以及美国贸易战压力加剧的影响，加拿大汽车行业11月大幅下滑。【原文：Canada’s auto sector slumped sharply in November, hit by a global chip shortage, softer demand and mounting US trade-war pressures.】

item.title: 托克公司运载的委内瑞拉原油抵达库拉索海岸
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团——美国总统唐纳德·特朗普指定负责销售委内瑞拉石油的大型商品贸易商之一——已将一艘油轮部署至库拉索岛近海，正准备卸载其首船货物。【原文：Trafigura Group, one of the large commodity traders tapped by US President Donald Trump to market Venezuelan oil, is preparing to discharge its first cargo after positioning a vessel off the shores of Curacao.】

item.title: 自动驾驶初创企业Tensor据悉将在美国IPO前寻求新一轮融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，开发自动驾驶汽车的初创企业Tensor Auto Inc.正考虑在美国首次公开募股前筹集数亿美元资金。【原文：Tensor Auto Inc., a startup that develops autonomous vehicles, is considering raising several hundreds million dollars ahead of a potential initial public offering in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI寻求美国本土供应商以推进机器人及人工智能设备计划
item.description:
这家人工智能初创公司正在向硬件制造商征集提案，作为其产品扩展计划的一部分。【原文：

The AI startup is requesting proposals from hardware makers as part of a product expansion

】

item.title: 摩根大通组建新量化交易团队以应对做市商竞争对手
item.description: 摩根大通公司已组建新的量化交易与研究团队，旨在加速其电子交易业务发展，同时抵御非银行竞争对手的冲击。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has formed a new quantitative trading and research group in a bid to speed up its efforts in electronic trading and fend off non-bank rivals.】

item.title: 军火供应商CSG引领欧洲顶级贸易企业IPO浪潮
item.description: 国防类股票在欧洲已热炒逾一年。如今这波涨势终于将推动该地区部分私营军工企业登陆公开市场。【原文：Defense stocks have been the hottest trade in Europe for more than a year. Now that rally is finally on the cusp of drawing some of the continent’s private arms makers onto public markets.】

item.title: Gunvor抢购北海原油，欧洲面临哈萨克斯坦供应短缺
item.description: 全球最大的独立石油贸易商之一贡沃集团正再度大举进军北海原油市场，抢购原油货运。此时欧洲正面临来自哈萨克斯坦的供应严重短缺问题。【原文：Gunvor Group, one of the world’s biggest independent oil traders, is once again piling into the North Sea crude market to snap up cargoes as Europe grapples with an acute shortage of supplies from Kazakhstan.】

item.title: 甲骨文公司因2025年债券发行相关披露信息遭起诉
item.description: 甲骨文公司遭债券持有人起诉，指控这家数据库巨头在2025年最大规模企业债券发行之一中借入180亿美元时，未披露增发债务的计划。【原文：Oracle Corp. was sued by bondholders who claim that the database giant failed to disclose plans to raise more debt when it borrowed $18 billion in one of 2025’s largest corporate bond offerings.】

item.title: 伊塔乌银行正与前央行官员洽谈经济学家职位事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，伊塔乌联合银行控股公司正与巴西前央行行长迪奥戈·吉伦洽谈，拟聘其担任首席经济学家一职。【原文：Itau Unibanco Holding SA is in talks with former Brazilian central bank director Diogo Guillen for a potential role as chief economist, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国与加拿大签署能源协议，卡尼力图减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 中国与加拿大正积极推动扩大能源合作，加拿大总理马克·卡尼领导的政府希望向这个亚洲经济强国出售更多石油和天然气，同时争取中国对电池技术和可再生能源领域的投资。【原文：China and Canada are pushing to expand energy deals, with Prime Minister Mark Carney’s government looking to sell more oil and gas to the Asian economic power while courting Chinese investment in battery technology and renewable energy.】

item.title: 格林希尔银行起诉英国政府，指控其错误终止贷款担保
item.description: 德国已倒闭的格林希尔银行正向英国政府索赔约3.3亿英镑（合4.41亿美元），指控英国政府错误地取消了其在新冠疫情期间与澳大利亚金融家莱克斯·格林希尔贸易融资部门达成的贷款担保协议。【原文：Germany’s defunct Greensill Bank AG is seeking about £330 million ($441 million) from the UK, accusing it of wrongly canceling Covid-era loan guarantees it agreed with Australian financier Lex Greensill’s trade finance arm.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒ETF在拥挤的14万亿美元市场中检验品牌实力
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普的社交媒体帝国正强势进军华尔街，携五只涵盖能源至国防等行业的全新"美国制造"基金，进军规模达14万亿美元的美国交易所交易基金（ETF）市场。【原文：Donald Trump’s social-media empire is muscling into Wall Street, entering the $14 trillion US ETF market with five new “Made in America” funds spanning industries from energy to defense.】

item.title: 尼日利亚12月通胀率因方法调整而回落
item.description: 尼日利亚年度通胀率在12月出现回落，此前该国统计局调整了计算方法，以避免因去年基期调整而造成的人为波动。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate fell in December after the statistics office revised its calculation method to avoid an artificial spike caused by last year’s rebasing.】

item.title: 纽约联储指定三菱日联金融集团为美国国债拍卖主要交易商
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团表示，其美国经纪自营商将加入纽约联邦储备银行指定的主要交易商行列，成为债券市场最精英的俱乐部之一。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. said its US broker-dealer will join the ranks of lenders designated as a primary dealer by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, one of the bond market’s most exclusive clubs.】

item.title: 道富银行加入加密货币热潮，推出数字资产服务
item.description: 道富集团正推出一系列代币化产品，以推动公司在日益流行的资产类别中实现增长。【原文：State Street Corp. is rolling out a suite of tokenized products as the firm pushes to grow in the increasingly popular asset class.】

item.title: 巴西富豪斯坦布鲁赫将出售CSN资产以削减债务
item.description: 巴西综合企业CSN计划剥离核心资产以减轻沉重的债务负担，因高利率正挤压融资渠道并拖累投资。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate CSN plans to divest key assets to reduce its heavy debt burden as high interest rates squeeze financing and weigh on investment.】

item.title: 盖璞任命新任首席娱乐官进军好莱坞
item.description: 盖璞公司任命前派拉蒙高管潘·考夫曼为其首位首席娱乐官，此举表明该公司正寻求扩大其媒体影响力。【原文：Gap Inc. tapped former Paramount executive Pam Kaufman to be its first chief entertainment officer, a sign the company is looking to grow its media presence.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所首次突破33,000点大关，科技股领涨
item.description: 加拿大股市突破33,000点大关，创下历史新高，科技股和工业股领涨。周四，S&P/TSX综合指数上涨0.3%，收于33,014点。【原文：Canadian stocks surpassed 33,000 to reach a record high as tech and industrials names rose. The S&P/TSX Composite Index moved 0.3% higher on Thursday to hit 33,014.】

item.title: 阿尔特曼的Merge公司筹集2.52亿美元，致力于实现人脑与计算机的连接
item.description: 由人工智能亿万富翁山姆·奥尔特曼联合创立的Merge Labs公司，致力于开发连接人脑与计算机的设备，近日完成2.52亿美元融资。【原文：Merge Labs, a company co-founded by AI billionaire Sam Altman that is building devices to connect human brains to computers, raised $252 million.】

item.title: 美股反弹，台积电财报重燃市场对人工智能板块信心
item.description: 周四美国股市强劲反弹，因交易员们纷纷涌入科技股，人工智能领域再度掀起乐观情绪。【原文：US stocks rallied on Thursday as traders piled into technology stocks on renewed optimism around artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 派拉蒙未能成功申请将华纳兄弟诉讼案纳入快速审理程序
item.description: 一名法官拒绝加快审理派拉蒙天空舞公司（Paramount Skydance Corp.）的诉讼案。该诉讼指控华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.）董事就奈飞公司（Netflix Inc.）提出的逾827亿美元收购要约误导投资者。【原文：A judge refused to fast track Paramount Skydance Corp.’s lawsuit accusing directors of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. of misleading investors about a more than $82.7 billion buyout bid from Netflix Inc.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率攀升，因失业数据引发降息疑虑
item.description: 短期国债收益率上升，因劳动力市场强劲迹象略微削弱了市场对美联储今年降息的预期。【原文：Short-term Treasury yields rose after a sign of labor-market strength slightly eroded expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 格拉平斯基称波兰央行即将结束降息周期
item.description: 波兰央行行长亚当·格拉平斯基表示，随着通胀率稳定在目标区间内，进一步降息的空间已所剩无几。【原文：Polish central bank Governor Adam Glapinski signaled there was little room left for more interest rate cuts as inflation stabilizes within the target.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友哈姆称石油生产商需获保障方可在委内瑞拉开展业务
item.description: 页岩油大亨哈罗德·哈姆表示，石油公司需要获得保证，确保其资产不会在未来某天被委内瑞拉政府没收——前提是这些公司协助该国恢复原油产量。【原文：Shale billionaire Harold Hamm said oil companies need guarantees their assets won’t someday be seized by Venezuela if they help revive the nation’s crude production.】
